articles.title: Challenger pins hopes on $1b investment splurge - The Australian Financial Review
articles.description: Challenger Financial Group shares tanked 15 per cent as it emerged the financial services company missed its profit target and was slow to react to the rebound in markets last year as it switched to a defensive position.
